ARTICLE.TITLE: HISD to receive 250 bicycles from Houston Parks Board to create Art Bike Parade entries
ARTICLE.TEXT:
The Houston Independent School District this weekend will receive 250 new bicycles donated by the Houston Parks Board, in collaboration with the Orange Show Center of Visionary Art, to enable students and teachers to create entries for the city’s inaugural Art Bike Parade on Saturday, May 9.

Schools will use science, technology, engineering, art and math (STEAM) to transform the bikes into mobile art pieces. All grade levels will participate in the project.

School representatives will pick up bikes for their campuses Saturday at HISD’s Barbara Jordan Career Center in northeast Houston.
